definitions.definition: a small remaining quantity of something.
examples: remains, remainder, leftovers, residue, rest; residuum the remnants of the picnic

definitions.definition: a piece of cloth or carpeting left when the greater part has been used or sold.
examples: scrap, piece, bit, fragment, shred, offcut, oddment remnants of cloth

definitions.definition: a small minority of people who will remain faithful to God and so be saved (in allusion to biblical prophecies concerning Israel).
